sentence.Network_en: He smiled placatingly and tucked the bills away in his pocket.
sentence.Network_cn: 冯云卿陪着笑脸说,就把那些票据收起来.

auth_sentence.content: "They're just toys, for babies," he said placatingly, still forcing himself to smile.
auth_sentence.res_content: "They're just toys, for babies," he said placatingly, still forcing himself to smile.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: "They're just toys, for babies," he said placatingly, still forcing himself to smile.

baesInfo.translate_result: placating安抚，抚慰，使平静( placate的现在分词 )
baesInfo.ciba_translate_msg: 以上结果来自机器翻译。
